senses.sense_definition: A flow of water that moves across or against the main direction of the current.

examples.text: The swimmer struggled against the strong <w>crosscurrent</w> that pulled him away from the shore.
Navigating the river was difficult due to a dangerous <w>crosscurrent</w> near the bend.

senses.sense_definition: A conflicting tendency, opinion, or influence that goes against a general trend.

examples.text: The book describes the intellectual <w>crosscurrents</w> of the eighteenth century.
She found herself caught in the <w>crosscurrents</w> of office politics.
